channel.title: Programming & Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content on Programming & Computer Science

item.description: I am a professor in Computer Science at a Canadian university. My job description is very open ended. Teaching A large chunk of my time is spent on the education of computer science. Normally, I teach four undergraduate courses on a variety of topics in computer science. Given that my expertise is in systems, my teaching is usually limited to systems courses such as Compilers and Databases. Research
Ken Pu, Ph.D. (Toronto, 2006) Associate Professor / Faculty of Science / UOIT ken . pu @ uoit . ca I also hold an adjunct position at University of Toronto.
